body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to our customer support. My name is Douglas Torres and I represent Secure Auto Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. To assist you better, could you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two two three - four one zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Additionally, could you share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is s.cox@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Sarah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
